original_title: 箱女 見られる人妻
overview: Eros drama starring sexy actress Shiori Kamisaki. Eriko, who lives with her husband, who works for a pharmaceutical company, is in agony because of her husband's suspicions of cheating. She started chatting with her to relieve her stress, and gradually got excited with extreme play.
title: Hako Onna Mirareru Hitozuma
